distance_range_km.title: Distance group in km
distance_range_km.description:
Distances grouped into sets of 5 km (e.g. travel distance of 10-15 km). 
The key figures ‘Number of journeys by train (effective)’ and ‘Number of journeys by road (effective)’ refer to the travel distance when using public transport routes.
For the key figures ‘Number of journeys by train (direct)’ and ‘Number of journeys by road (direct)’, the travel distance is measured as the crow flies between the start and end location.

number_trips_by_train_actual.title: Number of journeys by train (effective)
number_trips_by_train_actual.description:
Number of journeys by train with effective travel distance (measured using transport routes) for a particular distance group and day. 
If the number of journeys is less than 20 (< 20), the value is listed as ‘< 20’ for data protection reasons.
Example: on 01/01/ 2017, there were 7,722 train journeys with a distance of between 65 km and 70 km.

number_trips_road_actual.title: Number of journeys by road (effective)
number_trips_road_actual.description:
Number of journeys by road with effective travel distance (measured using transport routes) for a particular distance group and day. 
If the number of journeys is less than 20 (< 20), the value is listed as ‘< 20’ for data protection reasons.
Example: on 01/01/ 2017, there were 38,910 journeys with a distance of between 65 km and 70 km.

number_trips_by_train_direct.title: Number of journeys by train (direct)
number_trips_by_train_direct.description:
Number of journeys by train for a particular distance group and day. Travel distance measured as the crow flies between start and end location. 
If the number of journeys is less than 20 (< 20), the value is listed as ‘< 20’ for data protection reasons.
Example: on 01/01/ 2017, there were 5,272 train journeys with a distance of between 65 km and 70 km.

number_trips_road_direct.title: Number of journeys by road (direct)
number_trips_road_direct.description:
Number of journeys by road for a particular distance group and day. Travel distance measured as the crow flies between start and end location. 
If the number of journeys is less than 20 (< 20), the value is listed as ‘< 20’ for data protection reasons.
Example: on 01/01/ 2017, there were 25,076 journeys with a distance of between 65 km and 70 km.
